name: Verbum
description:
Complete the free crossword puzzle template using the proposed words/pieces.

"Verbum" is a free crossword puzzle suitable for all ages. It work without Internet connection, in offline mode. 
Improve your English, Italian, Spanish (French, Portuguese, Romanian [coming soon]) dictionaries and easily learn new words.

Features:
- 2 game modes (word, piece)
- 2 difficulty levels (easy 7x10 scheme, normal 10x10 scheme)
- 6 languages
- infinite offline random patterns (always different)
- absolutely free
- challenging and simple to play
- a fun and educational game
- no time limit
- save your scores

- no in-app purchases
- no ads
- no internet connection
- for Windows and Android (phones and tablets).

How to play:
Drag the words/pieces alphabetically to the bottom of the screen and complete the crossword puzzle.
Words/pieces are automatically rotated when they meet a horizontal or vertical placeholder.
The placeholder turns green if the word / piece has the same length as the placeholder, red if the length is different.
If you release the word/piece when the placeholder is green, the word/piece is placed in the model, when the placeholder is red or in another position on the screen the word/piece returns to the initial position.

The GREEN background does not indicate that the word/piece is in the correct position of the scheme.

The word definitions are automatically placed on the schema. You can view a different definition with a tap on the placemark or turn the display on/off from the Options/Settings panel.

When the crossword puzzle is completed, all errors are highlighted on a red background. Correct errors by moving words/pieces or using the error removal option.

At the end of each game a star is awarded, 5 stars of the 'Best time ()s' are improved.
Stars can be used, from the Backgrounds option, to view images that have not yet been unlocked.
